system_info.query: SELECT hostname, cpu_brand, cpu_physical_cores, cpu_logical_cores, physical_memory, hardware_vendor, hardware_model FROM system_info;
system_info.description: Basic system information and hardware details
system_info.value: Track hardware inventory and system specifications

uptime_monitoring.query: SELECT days, hours, minutes, seconds, total_seconds FROM uptime;
uptime_monitoring.value: Monitor system availability and reboot frequency

disk_usage.query: SELECT device, path, blocks_size, blocks, blocks_free, blocks_available, inodes, inodes_free FROM mounts WHERE path IN ('/', '/home', '/var', '/tmp', '/boot') AND device NOT LIKE 'tmpfs%';
disk_usage.description: Disk space usage for critical mount points
disk_usage.value: Monitor disk space to prevent storage issues

memory_usage.query: SELECT memory_total, memory_free, memory_available, buffers, cached, swap_total, swap_free FROM memory_info;
memory_usage.value: Track memory utilization for performance monitoring

cpu_utilization.query: SELECT user, nice, system, idle, iowait, irq, softirq, steal, guest, guest_nice FROM cpu_time WHERE cpu = 'cpu';
cpu_utilization.value: Monitor CPU performance and resource usage

load_average.description: System load average over different periods
load_average.value: Track system load and performance trends

network_interfaces.query: SELECT interface, address, mask, broadcast, point_to_point, type, mtu FROM interface_addresses WHERE address != '127.0.0.1' AND address != '::1';
network_interfaces.value: Monitor network interface status and configuration

listening_ports.query: SELECT pid, family, protocol, local_address, local_port, path FROM listening_ports;
listening_ports.value: Track exposed network services for security assessment

running_services.query: SELECT name, status, pid FROM systemd_units WHERE sub = 'running' AND unit_file_state = 'enabled';

package_updates.query: SELECT name, version, source, size FROM deb_packages WHERE name IN (SELECT name FROM apt_sources);
package_updates.value: Track package installations for vulnerability management

os_version.query: SELECT name, version, major, minor, patch, build, codename, arch FROM os_version;
os_version.value: Track OS versions for patch management

kernel_info.value: Monitor kernel configuration and security parameters

filesystem_events.query: SELECT target_path, action, time FROM file_events WHERE target_path LIKE '/var/log/%' AND time > (SELECT max(time) FROM file_events) - 3600;
filesystem_events.description: Log file system activity in the last hour
filesystem_events.value: Monitor log file changes and rotation

hardware_events.query: SELECT model, serial, removable, size FROM block_devices WHERE removable = 1;
hardware_events.value: Track USB and removable media connections

temperature_monitoring.query: SELECT name, celsius, max_celsius, critical_celsius FROM temperature_sensors;
temperature_monitoring.value: Monitor hardware temperature for thermal management
